Package dev.todoapp.infrastructure

Class Service

java.lang.Object
software.amazon.jsii.JsiiObject
software.constructs.Construct
dev.todoapp.infrastructure.Service
All Implemented Interfaces:
software.amazon.jsii.JsiiSerializable, software.constructs.IConstruct, software.constructs.IDependable
public class Service extends software.constructs.Construct
Creates an ECS service on top of a Network. Loads Docker images from a Service.DockerImageSource and places them into ECS task. Creates a log group for each ECS task. Creates a target group for the ECS tasks that is attached to the load balancer from the Network.
